Package com.ashtonit.odb.pool

Contains the classes that implement the OrientGraph pool.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OrientGraphPool
    An OrientGraphPool instance maintains a pool of OrientGraph instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OrientGraphPoolFactory
    An implementation of ObjectFactory that returns an OrientGraphPool instance in response to a JNDI lookup.
    OrientGraphPoolImpl
    The implementation of the OrientGraphPool interface.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OrientGraphPoolException
    Thrown when the pool cannot return an OrientGraph instance.

Package com.ashtonit.odb.pool Description

Contains the classes that implement the OrientGraph pool.

OrientGraphPool and OrientGraphPoolFactory are referenced when configuring the pool as a resource in the web application or server context. OrientGraphPool can be looked up via a JNDI naming service.

Author:
Bruce Ashton
